subject: Drag Racing
Paralysis
Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: Darrell Gwynn, who was paralyzed in a 1990 drag race, and the 79-year-old Don Garlits, known as Big Daddy, are back competing against each other, with a twist.
snippet: Darrell Gwynn, who was paralyzed in a 1990 drag race, and the 79-year-old Don Garlits, known as Big Daddy, are back competing against each other, with a twist.
